landing-title: Close enough to stay connected, Far enough to truly escape
landing-text-1: Milestone is launching an exclusive residential project on the southern slope of Tsavkisi. Located on a sunlit hillside, the project includes 63 individual land plots offering panoramic views of the forest and the city.
landing-text-2: Project : Tsavkisi is a thoughtfully planned community with a unified architectural identity, fully integrated into the natural landscape. It is designed for those who wish to build their dream home in a peaceful, nature-rich setting without losing connection to the city.
architect-section-text: The architectural vision of Project : Tsavkisi is rooted in a landscape-oriented approach. To create a unique living environment, we have developed a set of architectural guidelines - a Design Code, where every element is thoughtfully connected to the next. This framework helps our future residents build homes that contribute to a distinct and harmonious lifestyle in a natural, suburban setting.
architect-section-mobile-text:
The architectural vision of
Project : Tsavkisi is rooted in a landscape-oriented approach. To create a unique living environment, we have developed a set of architectural guidelines - a Design Code, where every element is thoughtfully connected to the next. This framework helps our future residents build homes that contribute to a distinct and harmonious lifestyle in a natural, suburban setting.
sales-section-title: Land Plots on the Forest Edge
sales-section-text: Choose the location that best suits your lifestyle - a quiet plot nestled by the forest, or an elevated plot offering panoramic views of the city, each offering direct access to nature and a unique sense of tranquility.
collaborations-section-text: გაეცანი სპეციალურად პროექტ:წავკისისთვის შექმნილ ინდივიდუალურ სახლის პროექტებსა და მათ ავტორებს.  კოლაბორაციის შედეგად, სხვადასხვა სპექტრის და მიმართულებების მქონე წამყვანმა სტუდიებმა შემქნეს ინდივიდუალური კონცეპციები. შენობების გემოეტრია მიღებულია ჩვენი დიზაინკოდისა და ლანდშაფტური არქიტექტურის პრინციპების გათვალისწინებით.
